Download Commotion OpenWRT - Ubiquiti

The images below can be flashed on M-Series wireless routers from Ubiquiti. The router model for each image is listed above the download file.

Don't see your router in this list? See the Commotion OpenWRT Supported Hardware page.

Stable Builds:

File Date Size MD5
Developer Release 1.1 (DR1.1)

Ubiquiti Picostation M2/M5 and Ubiquiti Bullet M2/M5 -- Factory Install

openwrt-ar71xx-generic-ubnt-bullet-m-squashfs-factory.bin(sig)

 05/24/2013 01:35 am 5.6 MB bcb632d88d18d939749506e8d137a5f3

Source Code

In addition to the main source code repository above, source code for all of the individual Commotion-OpenWRT components can be found on our Github page.
